name: Cannon and Ball
description:
Cannon and Ball are a couple. They truly enjoy each other's company. But despite that, there's something else they've both always wanted.

The absolute power of royalty.

So Cannon and Ball are storming the nearest castle in order to dethrone its ruler. The power of their love chains them together... or, well, I guess that's a literal chain. Well, ok, not exactly a regular chain. This one has some wonky physics. Like it can go through walls. Weird I know.

But Cannon and Ball will use any advantages they have to overthrow the king. Their connection may occasionally hold them back, but maybe it be used to pull them forward as well.
